com.beardedhen.androidbootstrap.api.view

Interface ProgressView

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BootstrapProgressBar

    public interface ProgressView
    Views which implement this interface visually display ongoing progress to users

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String KEY_ANIMATED 
      static java.lang.String KEY_DRAWN_PROGRESS 
      static java.lang.String KEY_STRIPED 
      static java.lang.String KEY_USER_PROGRESS

    • Method Detail

      • setProgress

        void setProgress(int progress)
        Updates the amount of progress displayed to the user.
        Parameters:
        progress - an integer between 0-100

      • getProgress

        int getProgress()
        Returns:
        the amount of progress displayed to the user (0-100)

      • setStriped

        void setStriped(boolean striped)
        Sets whether the view should display a striped pattern.
        Parameters:
        striped - true for a striped pattern, false for a plain pattern

      • isStriped

        boolean isStriped()
        Returns:
        true if the view is displaying a striped pattern, otherwise false

      • setAnimated

        void setAnimated(boolean animated)
        Sets whether the view should animate itself. If the view is striped, the animation will run in an infinite loop; if the view is not striped, the animation will only be visible when setProgress() is called.
        Parameters:
        animated - whether the view should animate its updates or not.

      • isAnimated

        boolean isAnimated()
        Returns:
        true if the view should animate itself
